elements.name: narrativeMessageTypeCode
elements.description:
01 = Message Rejected
02 = Message Accepted
03 = Message Accepted with Warning(s)
04 = Message Referred to Human Review
11 = Record Rejected
13 = Record Accepted with a Warning

elements.name: narrativeMessageIdentifier
elements.description: A code identifying the narrative message.

elements.name: narrativeMessage
elements.description: A narrative message indicating the acceptance or rejection of the input data.

elements.name: envelopeNumber
elements.description: Envelope Number with the accepted FDA transaction
